Summary: This script stops an RG deployment . .  It is the stop script that goes along with this: https://gallery.technet.microsoft.com/scriptcenter/Azure-Resource-Group-6ee2c700 Stop-AzureRMDeploy -DP D1This will provide an out-gridview pop up to select the deployments that you wan
